summary: Want to have more thralls? Want to have animals as well as people? Why are you limiting yourself? Download NOW!
descriptionHtml:
[About]
I found myself disliking that I could only summon two things at a time, when in Morrowind I could have 50 flame atronachs destroying a city with me. So after tweaking the "Twin Souls" perk I gave myself the ability to summon as many as I'd need. I have it set to 30, which should be plenty, as more might hurt performance. I also modified the "Dead Thrall" spell to animate more than just human NPC's, check out my video below to see the mod in action.

[youtube]2wyjmx0M_Is[/youtube]

[NOTE]
The screenshot shows the modified Dead Thrall spell as costing 0 magicka. I used my other mod (God Maker) on this character. So assuming you did not modify your game stats it will cost the normal amount.

player.dispelallspells - this is a console command to release the thralls who can't find their way home :( In case anyone needs it.
author: Korodic

files.name: Unrestricted Conjuration
files.changelogHtml: You can now reanimate horses :D the other races either cannot be changed (like the guard, probably can with CK) or have issues when trying to be resurrected (like the dragon).
